reviewText:
Suspect developer.  After getting a black screen (of my 39 Steam games, this is the only game I have issues with), I contacted the developer and left a message on the forum.  He responded that my computer didn't meet minimum qualifications and I should have checked before purchasing.

My computer: AMD A8 3.4 ghz x4, 11gb RAM, Win 7, AMD 7700 HD 1gb

This far exceeds the listed minimum and recommended specifications.

I would be very careful purchasing this game.  You should avoid the headache.  Apparently, the game itself isn't very good as well.  Not that I can play it.

So I could leave this review, I had to let the black screen run for a total of five minutes.  Lol.

reviewText: This game is fun! I love the UI, better than most. I would recommend to friends. I would like to see more content if possible from the developer!

reviewText:
I played the game, and got thru the first level no problem, but need to improve my bonus stars. I enjoyed this game. Some early growing pains for developer because some users don't have updated AMD drivers.

Game looks good, Plays ok too.

I really enjoy testing the bridge I create!  HINT: You need to press the RED button to test your Bridge!
Also, the default seems to have stress test colors OFF, so don't forget to press Green Button to turn them on.

Full Disclosure: I received game key to test this game and it seems fine to me. The Developer is a good guy, give him a chance and he will work hard to fix problems.

reviewText: At first, the game looks good enough, but the lack of tutorials for new players or any sort of discussion to ease new players into the game doesn't exactly make me glad I bought the game.

reviewText: This game is ok, and has better interface than most other bridge builder sims out there from what i noticed. However its lacking gameplay. I havent played it long enough to unlock its full potential. but its first impressions are slow at showing it.\n

reviewText: This game locked my machine up so tight I had to power down to recover. Tried it 3 times with input from their tech support -- nada.
i had a lot of fun with this game, it is, what it says.  the game is on a bit of a narrow path, as far as getting creative goes, it is set up as more of a challenge" type scenario
